https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/AsxIPRUS6BJTKjoqfG6a4fK8oU3.jpg During a violent thunderstorm, a family is awoken by piercing shrieks which summon the dead to rise again. Their lives explode in a blood soaked fury as they battle malevolent spirits, whilst fighting to save their souls from eternal torment with... the Banshee. Damned by Dawn
